body.name: Tempur-Pedic TEMPUR-Protect Pillow Protector, Queen - 28.5" x 20", White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 17 mins
features: TEMPUR-PEDIC WATERPROOF PILLOW PROTECTOR—Keep your pillow feeling new with a stain-resistant pillow protector that protects against spills and moisture.
TEMPERATURE-BALANCING MATERIAL—The ThermalSense technology in this pillow protector helps your body better regulate temperature as you sleep.
WASHER- & DRYER-SAFE—For your convenience, this cover is easily machine-laundered and dried.
body.description: Protect your pillows—and your sleep—with TEMPUR-Pedic technology, designed with you in mind. Our TEMPUR-Protect Pillow Protector features temperature-balancing material to keep you sleeping comfortably, and water-resistant technology to protect against spills and stains. When it’s time to launder, simply toss your pillow protector in the washer and dryer for convenient care..

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: Machine wash warm, no chlorine bleach, tumble dry on medium heat only, and DO NOT iron. Bleaching will void the warranty.

productInformation.name: Warranty Description
productInformation.value: This limited warranty is valid only in connection with the original purchase of new products from authorized retailers and extends from the original purchase date of the original product purchased. An “original purchaser,” for the purposes of this limited warranty, is an individual or entity who purchases the product directly from tempur-pedic or an authorized retailer of tempur-pedic with the intent to use the product for personal consumer use and not for commercial or industrial use and not with the intent to resell the product. An “authorized retailer,” for purposes of this limited warranty, is an individual or entity authorized by tempur-pedic to sell product directly to original purchasers. An individual or entity that purchases the product from whatever source with the intent to resell the product is an unauthorized reseller (“unauthorized reseller”)".

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Machine wash warm, no chlorine bleach, tumble dry on medium heat only, and DO NOT iron. Bleaching will void the warranty. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's easy to clean and doesn't take long to dry
reviews.reviewText: I fall asleep instantly with this thing on my Tempurpedic. I can't tell if it's because of the pillow or the pillow case. This is the softest and coziest thing I've slept on in a while. It's easy to clean and doesn't take long to dry. Stains seem to come out really easily as well.Pro:SoftTexturedWarmCon:I wish I had ordered more than one.Zipper feels a bit flimsyIf this review isn't edited in 6 months or by next year then that means that the zipper doesn't break or is pretty durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This pillow protector is made with quality, and is thick & comfortable. It fits a queen a Tempur-Pedic pillow size queen perfectly, and it's slightly big for a standard size pillow (although still works fine). The price was well under retail stores like Kohls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and stretchy
reviews.reviewText: This soft and stretchy pillow cover works great on my Temperpedic Pillow under pillowcase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are firm as hell they are water proof but not stain proof i recommend a darker protective cover cuz white gets dirty so fast but overall it’s pretty good this is just the protective covering you do not wanna sleep on just this it will break you out especially if you have sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my Tempurpedic pillows
reviews.reviewText: Great protector for our new Tempur pillows. My husband has a high profile pillow and I have a low, so even though both are queen size they look a bit different. This protector fit both (though it’s roomier on mine) and will keep our expensive pillows clean when used with a regular pillow case. I also like that it masks the light blue swirly lines on the pillows themselves which showed through our white pillow cases. We have the Cloud Pro + Cooling pillows which are only sold in Tempur stores. Also, there is no discernible difference in comfort, conforming, or heat when adding this protector. I thought the price on Amazon was excellent too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many of the most expensive pillows. If I could give these more than five stars I would. They don’t fail in any category whatsoever. In my opinion they are worth the money and especially so If discounted on Amazon.I am speaking as a side sleeper and you may take that into consideration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars not for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I bought a new gel foam pillow. It’s not by tempurpedic. First time I’ve ever bought this different brand. I love the pillow but hated the pillow case. It had a scratchy border. So I took a chance and purchased this tempurpedic pillow case and it’s perfect. So now I really love my new pillow. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: If you own tempur pillows (you already have this)
reviews.reviewText: Seller isKind and honest great ! Has an awesome warranty and great quality just you get them free with your pillows if you bought this brand just a little thinner,We will upgrade in a year or 2 when ares wear and buy from here 100%Great temp control tech keeps you cool, spill and smell resistant ( lady’sLove it)
Best pellow ever! Since day one this pellow let me fall in sleep like a baby! Not to soft not to hard. Only think i cpuld add it Amazing !

reviews.reviewTitle: Cette housse améliore mon oreiller Temper Pedic Cloud !
reviews.reviewText: Cette housse améliore grandement le confort de mon oreiller Temper Pedic Cloud ! Elle rend l’oreiller encore plus moelleux qu’avec la housse de coton, et permet à l’oreiller de mieux respirer, et donc, d’être plus frais ! Elle est de bonne qualité!
Excellent! Il se lave très très bien à la machine. Il ne laisse pas passer l’humidité, vraiment excellent!
